_source.short_desc: Cloud-based and designed for law firms: Soluno is a powerful, easy-to-use time, billing, accounting, trust and reporting software.
_source.long_desc:
Soluno is a cloud-based accounting and billing software designed for law firms. With a full, easy-to-use suite of time/expense entry, billing, accounting, trust, and reporting features, law firms get everything they need to master their business.

Get your money faster with Soluno's best-in-class trust accounting, custom billing arrangements, advanced invoicing, and more. Always backed by 5-star support.

Soluno offers 100% free data conversions from some of the industry's most common solutions.
_source.pricing_details:
One cost to access all features; no additional add-ons required.

A Soluno license starts at $79/month (USD) billed monthly, or $71/month (USD) billed annually. This price decreases based on the number of licenses your firm needs.

Part-time users may share licenses.

Sales tax may apply. No long-term contract or setup fee is required.
_source.target_audience: 1 - 100+ users. Soluno is a scalable solution that can satisfy the needs of law firms of all sizes.

category_features.name: Accounting

category_features.definition: Setup and send recurring or automated bills

category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.definition: Work on a set of tasks related to a particular charge, patient, legal issue or any other complex entity or process

category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime. Used by over 4.5 million customers, QuickBooks provides smart tools for your business, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage expenses, send invoices, track inventory, and even run payroll. With QuickBooks Online, you can get organized, save time, and even get paid fast by adding payment features. Best of all, you can try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: Ranked #1, Clio is the leading legal billing software with the most 5-star reviews. Schedule a live demo to learn more.
related_products.features: Ranked #1, Clio is the leading legal billing software with the most 5-star reviews and the only legal software with over 1,000 reviews on Capterra. Clio is a cloud-based legal billing solution that lets you manage your law firm securely from anywhere. Bill your clients in a way that's easy for both of you. Clio's legal billing software automates time-consuming tasks - saving you time and helping you get paid faster. Schedule a live demo to learn more.

related_products.short_desc: New realities call for new solutions. We are the #1 time and billing, and payments software for law firms. Try for FREE now.
related_products.features: At HALF THE COST of other solutions, TimeSolv provides the robust time and billing needs law firms demand, without the extra features you never use. Store payment information using TimeSolvPay and run hundreds of payments in seconds on YOUR timeline, achieving ZERO AR! For over 20 years, our web-based solution has helped lawyers increase their billable time and get paid faster, whether at home or in the office. Integrate with LawPay, QuickBooks, Office 365, and more. Try for FREE for 30 days!

related_products.short_desc: Professional services automation software that helps firms with project management, time tracking, billing, reporting, and accounting
related_products.features: BigTime is a leading Professional Services Automation (PSA) software that helps you scale your business by giving you the ability to track and act on your operational metrics. Even with remote work, easily manage time, expenses, and billing for multiple projects all at once, and quickly identify areas of opportunity with advanced features like resource allocation and custom reporting. With BigTime Wallet and client portal, you can get paid faster using custom invoicing and payment processing.

related_products.short_desc: The BQE CORE Legal cloud with business and artificial intelligence simplifies time/billing and accounting includes a robust mobile app.
related_products.features: CORE Legal's cloud practice solution with integrated time, billing and accounting is designed for law firms. Business intelligence displays financial data in real-time Dashboards with a fresh user-friendly interface in a logical format. Capture more time and expenses, streamline billing, accounting, and reporting. Meet client billing requirements utilizing billing arrangements, batch processing, LEDES billing, split billing, trust accounting, human resource management to improve profitability.

related_products.short_desc: Mobile friendly & secure legal billing software that's easy to use. Track time. Bill clients. Get paid faster. Start free.
related_products.features: Join the HIGHEST RATED legal billing software on Capterra! See why tens of thousands of law firms in over 170 countries use PracticePanther to automate their workflows and get more done in less time. Never miss deadlines, get paid faster, seamlessly track billable time & expenses. Work from anywhere, on any device, with our mobile app. It's easy, user-friendly and intuitive. Now you can spend less time managing your firm and more time making money. Try it free, no credit card needed.

related_products.short_desc: MyCase is a complete legal billing solution - track time, automate billing and invoicing & accept online payments in one place.
related_products.features: From time tracking to invoice creation to collecting payment and everything in between, MyCase simplifies an otherwise complicated process with comprehensive end-to-end billing and reconciliation, saving your firm precious time each month. Start your free trial today (no credit card required)!

related_products.short_desc: Collaborate on projects, track time, manage expenses and invoice your customers. Available in the cloud, from any device!
related_products.features:
Run a better legal practice with streamlined collaboration, easy time & expense tracking and online invoicing. 

Avaza is an all-in-one solution for project management, resource scheduling, tracking time, managing expenses, quotes & invoices. Teams of all sizes, from freelancers to large businesses, will love it, for its simple & intuitive design with powerful features. Available in the cloud, from any device.

related_products.short_desc: AbacusLaw generates professional, polished invoices for any fee arrangement and billing schedule.
related_products.features: AbacusLaw will improve your cash flow by invoicing and collecting from clients so you can focus on your business. Founded in 1983, AbacusLaw can handle all billing aspects including time, trust accounting, general ledger, payroll, accounts payable and receivable, check writing, financial statements, court rules, auto-fill court PDF forms, cases, conflicts, contacts, dockets, docs, emails, files and more. Also available in our private cloud for a complete disaster-proof solution.

related_products.short_desc: CosmoLex is the only cloud-based, total practice management, billing, and accounting system (no QuickBooks? required).
related_products.features: Thousands of law firms have switched to CosmoLex as it is the only cloud-based practice management software with built-in compliant legal accounting (no QuickBooks? required). The one price, one login CosmoLex system eliminates the constant struggle of juggling multiple platforms to handle law practice management, billing, and accounting. CosmoLex also includes built-in LawPay with no fixed monthly fee. CosmoLex offers everything you need to run your entire law practice. Try free today!

related_products.short_desc: LEAP is legal billing software for solo and small law firms to generate bills quickly and easily and reduce billing errors.
related_products.features: LEAP is legal billing software for solo and small law firms wishing to become more efficient, more productive and make more money. Use LEAP to generate bills quickly and easily and minimize billing errors. LEAP Legal Billing integrates seamlessly with QuickBooks. Other important features include hourly rate and flat-fee billing options, instant time capture and the ability to create matter related invoices.

SECURE AND CLOUDLESS - Law Office Billing/ Management Software
for solo and small law offices, comprehensive system. FREE Data Import!
similar_products.features:
SECURE AND CLOUDLESS Law Office Practice Management Software -
ProTempus is a world-class, comprehensive system designed for solo and small law firms. Our unique technology keeps your data on your local network, not in the cloud, and your authorized staff has access to all your data through the sharable database. Billing/ invoicing, Case Management, Calendar / Time keeping, Trust accounting, Contact and Task Management, AR, AP, GL are just a few of our features. FREE data imports of your data!

With tracking of legal cases and claims through advanced automation, Acuity provides a guide for best practices with advanced reporting dashboards to guide you through the legal processes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Law Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Law Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Law Practice Management software integrates and automates the front and back office activities of legal practices including: calendar management, appointment scheduling, case management, conflict checking, messaging, and more. These applications also often provide integrated solutions for time management, billing and collections as well as accounting. Law Practice Management solutions also provide tools for workflow and document management, marketing and inquiry tracking as well as distributing key data throughout the organization and across multiple office locations. Law Practice Management software is related to Legal Billing software, Legal Case Management software and Professional Services Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Case Management software coordinates documents, scheduling, conflicts, contacts, and reporting associated with legal cases. These applications enable an integrated solution to automate case management, client history tracking, and contracts as well as billing and accounting. Legal Case Management solutions also often include database management, electronic discovery, and automatic document template editing features, enabling organizations to manage, distribute, and update key case-related data. Legal Case Management software is related to Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time and Expense software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time and Expense tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time and Expense software automates the tracking of billable hours and reimbursement expenses. Time and Expense solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time and Expense applications can also be used for expense reporting by employees who travel frequently. Time and Expense software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.description: Time Tracking software automates the tracking of billable hours. Time Tracking solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time Tracking software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.description: Trust Accounting software allows administrators to manage trusts, estates and investment portfolios. Trust Accounting solutions can be used by bank trust departments, accountants, law firms, non-profit organizations and independent trust companies and helps to keep administrators in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. Trust Accounting software is related to Accounting software, Fund Accounting software, Law Practice Management software, Investment Management software and Legal Billing software.
